title: MAMEoXtras 1.6  (Fixed)
description:
MAMEoXtras v1.6  for Xbox1


Fixed version. First torrent was corrupted somehow.


---


Contains Rom-set and MAMEoXtras v 1.6.2


Note: 
This pack has NO connection with 'Coinops' on Xbox ; This is a separate Mame Project!


---


EmuXtras is a project to gather as much Xtras media for a gaming platform, and make it as complete as possible. Currently, this is all geared towards the Xbox and the Madmab Edition Emulator ports, but can also be used on other platforms. 

All games are tested on the Xbox and each gaming system has a compatibility spreadsheet. 
Games are pre-configured so that the user can simply select a game without the need to configure it themselves. 

		
---


Whats new in MameoXtras v1.6

Quote:
Major graphical update for all games using the ssv.c driver Rolled forward the video sources
to Mame97 adding shadow pen support plus implemented some graphical changes from 
Mame139 fixing Storm Blade Dyna Gear and Ultra X Weapons graphical errors 



Monster Slider has correct game logic now so it should play as it was meant to
Improved the controls in F-1 Exhaust Note Added the control fixes that Chaos kindly
provided for The Terminator 2 got the Continue Working in Double Wings just enable
the unlimitied coins cheat for it to kick in
